name: Hazardous Swamp
description:
Small shooter game from course on Coursera.

My changes:

  • Create own music for menu and game.
  • Add power-ups such us Life-up, Speed-up, FireRate-up
  • Add sprites for that power-ups
  • Add bush enemy
  • Redesigned all game (player, enemy, environment, bullet, UI etc.)
  • Add own cursor
  • Create 3 lvls:
    • noob lvl (Level1)
    • maze lvl (Level2)
    • ManyEnemyTryToSurvive lvl (Level3)

by Shults Sophia
